## Hello!

My name is **Andy Ho**, and I am currently a fourth-year undergraduate student at UCLA. I am currently pursuing a double major in both Mathematics/Economics and Statistics and Data Science.

I have a strong foundation in both mathematical theory and statistical analysis, which can be extremely helpful in solving real-world problems today. My passions involve data and statistical analysis in economic issues, especially those regarding education and international relations.
